it.polimi.se2018.model

Class DicePattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.DicePattern

  • public class DicePattern
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds information about the dice placed by a player on his WindowPattern. It offers limitations checks when a player want to place a Dice

      • checkEdge

        public boolean checkEdge(Position position)
        Checks if a position is on the edge of the DicePattern and if no dice has already been placed on the DicePattern before
        Parameters:
        position - The position to be checked
        Returns:
        True if the position required is on one of the edge of diceMatrix and there are no other dice placed on the DicePattern before

      • checkAdjacency

        public boolean checkAdjacency(Position position)
        Checks if there is a dice in any adjacent position
        Parameters:
        position - The position to be checked
        Returns:
        True if at least an adjacent position has a dice

      • checkAdjacentColourWithoutInitialPosition

                                                         Position initialPosition,
                                                         Dice dice)
        Checks if a dice respects the adjacentColour restriction without checking the startingPosition
        Parameters:
        finalPosition - The position to be checked
        initialPosition - The starting position of the dice
        dice - The dice to be placed
        Returns:
        True if the dice is placeable, false otherwise

      • checkAdjacentColour

        public boolean checkAdjacentColour(Position position,
                                   Dice dice)
        Checks if an orthogonal adjacent position has a dice of the same colour of the dice required
        Parameters:
        position - The position to be checked
        dice - The dice to be placed
        Returns:
        True if there is no dice with the same colour of the dice required

        Returns:

      • placeDice

        public void placeDice(Position position,
                      Dice dice)
        Places a dice on matrixDice, only if all the restrictions are met.
        Parameters:
        dice - The dice a player wants to place
        position - The position a player wants to place a dice on
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the dice can't be placed

      • removeDice

        public Dice removeDice(Position position)
        Removes and returns a dice from the required position
        Parameters:
        position - The position with a dice to be removed
        Returns:
        A dice from the required position.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the position required has no dice

      • moveDice

        public void moveDice(Position initialPosition,
                     Position finalPosition)
        Moves a dice from a position to another, checking that the initial position has a dice and that the final position is empty
        Parameters:
        finalPosition - The position where a user wants to move the dice in
        initialPosition - The position a user wants to take a dice from
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the initial position has a dice or the final position is empty
